comments:
Description:
Script chart.getDescription().setValue(?newDesc?) does not work.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070508-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with a Chart named "Chart".
2. Script->beforeFactory, input:
   var chart = this.getReportElement( "Chart" )
   chart.getDescription.setValue("newDesc");
   chart.getTitle().getCaption().setValue( chart.getDescription().getValue() );
3. Preview.

Expected result:
Chart Title is "newDesc".

Actual result:
The script does not take effect. 

Error log:
N/A

Error log:
ReportDesign (id = 1): 
- There are errors evaluating script "var chart3 = this.getReportElement( "Chart3" )

chart3.getDescription( ).setValue("newDesc");
chart3.getTitle().getCaption().setValue( chart3.getDescription( ).getValue( ) );":{1}. 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

).setValue("newDesc");chart3.getTitle().getCaption().setValue( chart3.getDescription( ).getValue( ) );":{1}. at *** Bug 186734 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

1. create a default emf object in simple api class if getting null in chart model.
2. remove all setter methods which include composite arguments for simple usage.
3. update junit test.

More change to simple api:
1. Update IFont impl due to model change #186926
2. Remove useless methods in INumberDataElement and IDataTimeDataElement
3. Enhance ChartComponentFactory to create objects and remove conversion methods to internal ChartComponentUtil
